name: Bereft of Freedom
description:
You wake up on the cold floor with no memory of how you got there. You have to escape and get your freedom back. You frantically begin finding and unlocking a series of locked doors and other obstacles in attempt to escape.

But then you realize there may be something more than a locked door challenging your freedom.

If you want to become an official sponsor of "Bereft of Freedom", go onto our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=44836368&fan_landing=true
